Package org.criteria4jpa.criterion

Interface Summary
Criterion Interface describing a restriction that can be added to a Criteria.
 

Class Summary
BetweenExpression Class representing a "between" restriction.
Conjunction Class representing a conjunction.
Disjunction Class representing a disjunction.
ILikeExpression Restriction class for case-insensitive LIKE expressions.
InExpression Class representing a "in" restriction.
IsEmptyExpression Class representing a "is empty" or "is not empty" restriction.
IsNullExpression Class representing a "is null" or "is not null" restriction.
JPQLExpression Class representing a custom JPQL restriction.
Junction Base class for Conjunction and Disjunction
MemberOfExpression Class representing a "(not) member of" restriction.
NotExpression Class representing a "not" restriction.
Restrictions Factory class for Criterion instances that can be added to a criteria by calling Criteria.add(Criterion).
SimpleExpression Basic restriction class for simple expressions "equals", "greater than", "like" and others.
 

Enum Summary
MatchMode Enum used for to specify a specific matching mode for LIKE expressions created with Restrictions.like(String, String, MatchMode)
